job.title: Engineering Coordinator
job.description: <ul><li><strong>Responsibilities:</strong>Guide certification samples for UL, FCC etc through manufacturing and test processes</li><li>Work with cross functional groups (Engineering, Operations, Manufacturing)</li><li>Must be able to lift 50 lbs- our units are heavy and bulky</li><li>Coordinate prototype builds with local PCB and PCBA houses</li><li>Will create part numbers in PLM system for legacy products - ARENA preferred/highly desirable</li><li>Organize and manage engineering inventories for new product development projects</li><li>Track sample shipments and incoming material for traceability</li><li>Track QA inspections in spreadsheet and publish monthly so defect patterns are summarized</li><li>RMA of lab equipment as needed</li><li><strong>Experience:</strong>Experience with PCBs and PCBAs,</li><li>Some work in the test and validation (highly desirable)</li><li>Familiar with PLMs systems – MS Office Suite (Excel)</li><li>Understands BOMs, ECO’s and part creation</li><li><strong>Soft Skills:</strong>Self starter, eager, motivated and highly organized</li><li>Good command of English language</li><li>Attention to detail- has a sense of urgency</li><li>Comfortable in a high powered environment</li><li>Organize lab space-&nbsp;tidy work space expected, hands on and can keep a neatly organized work space</li></ul><p></p>
